description:
**This course is updated and will work in 2016**

In this course, we will teach and demonstrate:

  • How to rank on the first page of Google using Youtube videos
  • How to consistently drive sales using Youtube

... basically how to setup your very own sales machines that work to bring you sales 24 hours a day, seven days a week, or your money back.

Today, you can start to make videos with YouTube, with no outlay whatsoever - and with ZERO prior experience!

See, Google owns Youtube, and I'm telling you :Google is working hard to rank videos on top of pages, and this could mean YOURS.

We have thaught over 11,000 students the ropes of internet marketing, and now we are once again over-delivering, so enjoy the ride !

You will need no cameras or any equipment - We'll show you how you can either record your screen to produce a video, or easily create free professional explainer videos that convert like crazy (the same type as our promo video).

Based on our huge successes, we have streamlined the process into one information-packed step-by-step guide !

We will also show you how to optimize your Youtube Channel (free!) in no time, to further increase your results.

I stress that you need no prior experience and that yes, you will learn to rank on page one overnight.

You are going to learn :

  1. How to quickly create amazing videos, in five minutes.
  2. The right way to use descriptions to get your video to rank through the roof
  3. How to use tags to show up on youtube's sidebar, and acquire insane amounts of views.
  4. How to make sure your viewers turn into buyers.

... and much, much more!

So, you've read this far! Thank you.

Reading time is up, now is time to take action.

This course comes with an unbreakable 30-days money back guarantee. We know you will succeed, and want you to take absolutely no risk !

You can start ranking videos and driving sales as soon as you have taken this course, that means today !

Click the "take this course" button, top right, now ... every minute without action is one less sale.

To Your Success,

Howard Lynch & Antoine Lelievre
title: Strategic Ways to Build Your Business with YouTube
